'''2.3.240''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on June 14, 2022.

== Additions ==
* Added [[Minecraft Legends]] into the launcher.
* (July 2) Gave the pig on the launcher screen a crown in memoriam of popular Minecraft [[YouTube]]r [[Technoblade]].
